settings.content: Earn free reward points with every purchase when you have an account on this website. Reward points will be credited after the product has been shipped and can be used towards your next purchase. Terms and conditions apply see details here.

settings.question: Does Utiva Cranberry PACs work?
settings.answer: Utiva Cranberry PACs is a great option to maintain a healthy urinary tract as our product guarantees 36mg of Proanthocyanidins (PACs for short). PACs are the active molecule from cranberry that are clinically proven to work. When taking Utiva daily, around the same time this results in a natural flush of the bladder. It is important to take Utiva around the same time as it works on a 24 hour cycle.

settings.question: What is the recommended dosage of Utiva Cranberry PACs?
settings.answer:
Utiva Cranberry PACs is recommended to be taken as per the following:

MAINTENANCE: 1 capsule daily at the same time every day

TRIGGER-ASSOCIATED or SYMPTOMATIC: 2 capsules the day of and 2 capsules 24 hours later. It is safe to take 2 capsules a day for a few days if needed.

Utiva Cranberry PACs can be taken with or without food.

settings.question: How long does it take for Utiva Cranberry PACs to work?
settings.answer: Utiva Cranberry PACs can provide benefits almost immediately in terms of how you feel. For a healthy urinary tract, it is best advised to take Utiva Cranberry PACs daily. Antibiotics are always required to clear the infection and you must consult your doctor if you are experiencing a UTI

settings.question: Is Utiva Cranberry PACs safe for people who have a history of kidney stones?
settings.answer: Most cranberry products are known to have high levels of Oxalates which can aggravate kidney stones as the majority of kidney stones are formed when oxalate binds to calcium while urine is produced by the kidneys. Utiva Cranberry PACs is unique because it only has trace amounts of Oxalates due to our unique extraction process.  We also do third party testing of our formulation to verify oxalate levels. Therefore, Utiva is safer for people with history of kidney stones. However, we do recommend checking with your doctor before starting any new supplement.

settings.question: Is Utiva Cranberry PACs a treatment for UTIs?
settings.answer: No. Treatment of UTIs is still recommended to be antibiotics due to the evidence available. Natural products are recommended for maintaining a healthy urinary tract.

settings.question: Are there any side effects or drug interactions with Utiva Cranberry PACs?
settings.answer: There are no known side effects with Utiva Cranberry PACs unless you are allergic to cranberries. Typically cranberry products are known to have high levels of Vitamin K and Oxalates. Utiva Cranberry PACs has removed the Vitamin K and only has trace amounts of Oxalates. It is always best to check with your Healthcare Practitioner if you have any specific concerns.

settings.question: Do I need to stop taking Utiva Cranberry PACs while on antibiotics?
settings.answer: Utiva Cranberry PACs is safe to take while on antibiotics and can also help ensure PACs are in your system to naturally flush the bladder.

settings.question: Is Utiva Cranberry PACs safe while pregnant?
settings.answer: Utiva Cranberry PACs is made of 100% natural cranberry and there is no studied risk for using cranberry products during pregnancy. Multiple clinical trials have been completed and if you’d like to know more,https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3924191/ check out this Norwegian study that observed the effects of cranberries on 100,000 pregnancies.

settings.question: Is Utiva Cranberry PACs safe for long term use?
settings.answer: Yes! Utiva Cranberry PACs l is safe for long term use. Most patients finding benefit are taking Utiva Cranberry PACs daily ongoing.

settings.question: Sex or any triggers (eg swimming , travelling)
settings.answer:
TRIGGER-ASSOCIATED or SYMPTOMATIC

Dosage: 2 capsules the day of and 2 capsules 24 hours later. It is safe to take 2 capsules a day for a few days if needed.

settings.question: Is Utiva Cranberry PACs dairy free and soy free
What are the ingredients in Utiva Cranberry PACs?
settings.answer: Each capsule of Utiva Cranberry PACs contains 240mg of Urophenol™️ - Cranberry (Vaccinium macrocarpon) fruit extract providing 15% proanthocyanidins (PACs) = 36mg PAC per DMAC/A2 method, Inactive Ingredients hypromellose and rice flour

settings.question: Can Utiva Cranberry PACs aggravate IC (Interstitial cystitis)?
settings.answer: Cranberry can lower the pH and an acidic environment is know to aggravate IC. We do have many patients with IC though. Some take an alkaline agent as well to balance the pH and others just continue with it and so they can get the benefits of Utiva Cranberry PACs. We advise you to consult your doctor regarding this.

settings.question: Why is Utiva Cranberry PACs so expensive?
settings.answer: Unlike most cranberry products, Utiva Cranberry PACs always discloses the amount of active molecules we have. In providing 36 mg of PACs (measured by DMAC/A2) from cranberries, Utiva Cranberry PACs is a clinically proven option to help maintain a healthy urinary tract.

settings.question: What can I do if I can not swallow the capsule?
settings.answer: You can open capsule and put the powder in apple sauce, yogurt, juice, cereal, smoothie or anything you like. This makes it easier for kids or the elderly. We do not recommend putting Utiva Cranberry PACs in anything hot.

settings.question: Where can I buy Utiva products?
settings.answer: Utiva products are available at select health food stores, medical clinics, Utivahealth.com and Amazon.com.

settings.question: How much PAC is in Utiva Cranberry PACs vs. the competition?
settings.answer: Most cranberry supplements have less than 5mg PACs and unlike most cranberry products, we at Utiva will always disclose the amount of active molecules we have. In providing 36 mg of PACs from cranberries, Utiva Cranberry PACs is a clinically proven option to help manage urinary tract. We encourage you to look for PAC content (measured by DMAC/A2 method) on competitor labels and share if you find it.

settings.question: I have more questions, how do I contact you?
settings.answer: You can contact us via email, phone or direct messaging on Facebook or Instagram. You can always refer to our website for more resources, tips and for general information.(https://www.utivahealth.com/). Our customer care numer is 1-888-622-3613. Our lines are open Monday to Friday from 9am to 6pm EST.

settings.question: What are the benefits of auto-refill?
settings.answer: Auto-refill offer the convenience to receive supplements every 3 months and ensure you never run out. All our auto-refill customers always have first preference for new material, stock and any events we carry out. There are also additional savings with every auto-refill order.

settings.name: Alaina Mills
settings.title: I am so thankful for this product!
settings.description: About 3 years ago I started getting UTIs. I went from having a UTI here and there to having Chronic UTIs. Ever since I started taking Utiva a couple of months ago, I haven’t had any infections and my bladder health feels more secure and protected. I am so thankful for this product, and I am definitely going to stay on it for the rest of my life.
